Lizzie, I don't write here often. In fact, this is my third time in respond=
ing to other than my question yesterday. 
=C2=A0
I HEAR what you are saying=
. I was skeptical , even as a medium, of my abilities, what I would see, he=
ar, feel and receive, even when witnessed by others=C2=A0and including phys=
ical manifestation.
=C2=A0
I got some "hard evidence" last June and through=
out the rest of 2009. We obtained/ photographed and have unretouched photos=
 from within our home, K meter readings, videos of our lights & stereo/tv t=
urning itself off and on , including changing channels with NO person being=
 responsible, NO intereference that could have caused it and outside witnes=
ses to said activities.Please bear with me if I am not overly clear or you =
feel things are left out, I will always answer questions! * smile * We have=
 hours of recordings, both video and audio, of the goings ons in our home a=
nd those of others, my partner Jay & I have met. 
=C2=A0
Let's talk, discus=
s this. Okay? I am more than willing to hear you out.
=C2=A0
Annie C.

Take=
 every chance you get because some things only happen once...

=C2=A0 






No I don't ha=
ve a spirit box, a Franks Box or anything like that.=C2=A0 And no, I do not=
 want one.
=C2=A0
I have=C2=A0been involved with=C2=A0this research a long =
time, been a paranormal researcher for a long time, with ten years of real =
investigative work under my belt to boot.
=C2=A0
I am not cutting anyone do=
wn at the knees here, not insulting anyones work or personal beliefs.=C2=A0=
 
=C2=A0
But this onslaught of betterment against logical thought and quest=
ioning is a bit troubling, do you not think?=C2=A0 Can we not hear both sid=
es?=C2=A0 
=C2=A0
Not every Skeptic is out to get you!=C2=A0 But you might =
be asked a few=C2=A0 questions.=C2=A0 And in the long run of things,=C2=A0w=
hat is will be.=C2=A0 There is no one "OUT TO GET YOU"
=C2=A0
That is not t=
he nature of discovery=C2=A0or of Science.=C2=A0 If, people are talking to =
dead people with (Effectively) broken radios, lets see the facts and analyz=
e it.=C2=A0 Let's test it! Let's get to the bottom of it.
=C2=A0
Let us=C2=
=A0really, really look at it.
=C2=A0
If anything like that was ever able to=
 be proven as a solid Scientific principle or fact, it would be monumental.=
=C2=A0 It would be Earth shattering and completely change how we=C2=A0view =
logic and science as we know it.
=C2=A0
So if this is real, lets look at it=
.=C2=A0Lets try and be objective about it?
=C2=A0
What is wrong with that?
=

=C2=A0"Nature is showing us only the tail of the lion, but I have no doubt=
 that the lion belongs to it even though, because of its large size, it can=
not totally reveal itself all at once." 
-=E2=80=94 Albert Einstein 



"It=
 is far better to grasp the universe as it really is than to persist in del=
usions, however satisfying and reassuring."
--Carl Sagan


"There is no suc=
h thing as an insignificant detail. Don't just look 
for what you want to f=
ind."
-- Me LOL

=C2=A0 




I am angry =
because I feel personally berated, as a=C2=A0Human with a thinking mind or =
brain!
=C2=A0
Why am I here?=C2=A0 To see if there is really=C2=A0anything =
to this idea and theory.=C2=A0 So far I am not seeing a whole lot other tha=
n people being pissed off at the questioning=C2=A0of ideas. 
=C2=A0
If this=
 is real, lets see it.=C2=A0 Get over all this "Skeptic" crap and prove the=

aith or religion, WONDERFUL!=C2=A0 Best of luck with it!=C2=A0 I got no pro=
blem with the idea.=C2=A0 If you don't want your ideas questioned, or it is=
 a mater of Faith, that is fine. But say so, and while you are at it, don't=
 kick the rest of us that are honestly looking at thing for what they are, =
not what we want them to be!
=C2=A0
But, when you put it out there as a sta=
tement of fact, and then ride the asses of anyone that questions it, I got =
more than a problem with it.
=C2=A0
I have sat back and been a member here =
for a long time. Keep my mouth shut, but this is more than crossing the lin=
e.
=C2=A0
If it is real, than lets look at it.=C2=A0 But when we look at it=
, lets look at what we know to be the truth and lets take all of that data =
into consideration and discernment before coming to a conclusion.
=C2=A0
Th=
at is not to much to ask!

=C2=A0"Nature is showing us only the tail of the=
 lion, but I have no doubt that the lion belongs to it even though, because=
 of its large size, it cannot totally reveal itself all at once." 
-=E2=80=
=94 Albert Einstein 



"It is far better to grasp the universe as it reall=
y is than to persist in delusions, however satisfying and reassuring."
--Ca=
rl Sagan


"There is no such thing as an insignificant detail. Don't just l=
ook 
for what you want to find."
-- Me LOL

=C2=A0

lf baked ideas, and insanity, yeah I said it, as a "Skeptic."

it would do you some good to research the word and idea behind it before yo=
u go off half cocked as you are.=C2=A0=C2=A0The world is not out to get you=

 WANTS IT TO BE!
=C2=A0
What it is, no more and no less!
=C2=A0
I am a Skep=
tic, it the true sense of the word.=C2=A0 And I have been holding my tongue=
 hoping you would pull out of this crap.=C2=A0 Frank, get a grip!
=C2=A0
No=
t everyone that disagrees with=C2=A0you is out to get you!=C2=A0 I have rea=
l problems with the whole theory, but I have never questioned your heart or=
=C2=A0integrity over it.=C2=A0 (Well, other than letting Moon play the danc=
e he is playing with YOUR BOX!)
=C2=A0
But, lets analytically look at this =
for what it is and find=C2=A0the truth of it?=C2=A0 If you want to turn it =
into a religion that is on top of some mountain, so be it!=C2=A0 But other =
people are not going to see the subject in black and white standards.
=C2=

Give it a rest and thinks about it.=C2=A0 The world is not out to get y=
ou Frank!

il.com>

ubject: Re: [EVP-ITC] nuff said?

=C2=A0 


=C2=A0I=C2=A0know what it is, e=
ven though I can't even spell it or pronounce it. It's what the skeptics an=
d debunkers tout as the answer to all paranormal experience. I think we oug=
ht to pull our claws back in, especially me!
=C2=A0
=C2=A0I have gotten "vo=
ices" that I thought were perfectly clear, and no one else could hear it, a=
nd some=C2=A0I found=C2=A0was just=C2=A0a snippet of music, so yeah, that h=
appens, but it does not eliminate or explain everything from the boxes, and=
 other EVP methods, you=C2=A0 just have to be aware of the possibility. Ano=
therr problem is broadcast fragments, sometimes they are just what they sou=
nd like, an ad for one thing or another, sometimes they can=C2=A0have sychr=
onistic meaning, and sometimes they can be altered in some way to form a me=
ssages, such as the recent one I had about learning sex, which was seemingl=
y ignored by all cuz it has the "s" word--I guess. The fragments can also b=
e distorted as the radio tuning is swept across a station, I don't accept e=
very word and syllable as meaning something. You have tio judge mnessage by=
 content and personal meaning. 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0I have seen faces stand up in =
a carpet right in front of me, not something I just happened across, someth=
ing that happened live as I watched. For someone to suggest that's imaginat=
ion I find very offensive.=C2=A0 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0When I first switched to a l=
inear sweep in the boxes, I could hear nothing but gibberish, then suddenly=
=C2=A0I could hear "them"=C2=A0speaking. I doubt that is all imagination ei=
ther, I think the mind(which is not brain) has to reprogram the ears, which=
 are brain, to hear.=C2=A0 I also think the skeptics can not allow this pro=
gramming to take place, hence they can't hear. I would be very surprised if=
 any of the hard core skeptics even turned on a box for fear that they may =
hear something that's not there. Rorke(the Phd) implied as much when he wan=
ted a box to test, or more=C2=A0like debunk. That crap is frikkin' pathetic=
!
=C2=A0
=C2=A0
=C2=A0
=C2=A0
F-S
=C2=A0


=C2=A0

For the record, I don't think all EVP's are due to pareidol=
ia.

=C2=A0It was implied that all this stuff is=
 "Pareidolia" , and because you could put a name on it that somehow meant i=

eseased loved ones through EVP, as well as questions answered, and science(=
althogh not all scientists)=C2=A0just ignores these inconvinient facts and =

isagree with as well. 
=C2=A0

oltage and video recording the monitor screen. So explain away why there is=
 a wolf image embedded in the guy's hat, an image of an alien below his ear=
, and why in God's name does he resembles the classic description=C2=A0of a=
n MIB or=C2=A0Shadow Person?=C2=A0 Pareidolia no doubt!
=C2=A0
=C2=A0F-S

<DIV></DIV>
<DIV> I know w=
hat it is, even though I can't even spell it or pronounce it. It's what the=
 skeptics and debunkers tout as the answer to all paranormal experience. I =
think we ought to pull our claws back in, especially me!</DIV>
<DIV> <=
/DIV>
<DIV> I have gotten "voices" that I thought were perfectly clear=
, and no one else could hear it, and some I found was just a=
 snippet of music, so yeah, that happens, but it does not eliminate or expl=
ain everything from the boxes, and other EVP methods, you  just have t=
o be aware of the possibility. Anotherr problem is broadcast fragments, som=
etimes they are just what they sound like, an ad for one thing or another, =
sometimes they can have sychronistic meaning, and sometimes they can b=
e altered in some way to form a messages, such as the recent one I had abou=
t learning sex, which was seemingly ignored by all cuz it has the "s" word-=
-I guess. The fragments can also be distorted as the radio tuning is swept =
across a station, I don't accept every word and syllable as meaning somethi=
ng. You have tio judge mnessage by content and personal meaning. </DIV>
<DI=
V> </DIV>
<DIV> I have seen faces stand up in a carpet right in f=
ront of me, not something I just happened across, something that happened l=
ive as I watched. For someone to suggest that's imagination I find very off=
ensive.  </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV> When I first switched to =
a linear sweep in the boxes, I could hear nothing but gibberish, then sudde=
nly I could hear "them" speaking. I doubt that is all imagination=
 either, I think the mind(which is not brain) has to reprogram the ears, wh=
ich are brain, to hear.  I also think the skeptics can not allow this =
programming to take place, hence they can't hear. I would be very surprised=
 if any of the hard core skeptics even turned on a box for fear that they m=
ay hear something that's not there. Rorke(the Phd) implied as much when he =
wanted a box to test, or more like debunk. That crap is frikkin' pathe=
tic!</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
